formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds all the connection information for Windows Azure.

formElement.label: Storage Account:
formElement.documentation: A name of the storage account that is unique within Windows Azure. This name is the DNS prefix name and can be used to access blobs, queues, and tables in the storage account.

formElement.label: Results location (output property path):
formElement.documentation: The ElectricCommander location to store properties (default is /myJob/Azure/deployed).

formElement.label: Results tag (output property name):
formElement.documentation: The unique tag for this operation to keep it separate from others stored in the same results location.

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
